body:
After I created a persistent volume, it throws an error on "describe".

``` yml
kind: PersistentVolume
apiVersion: v1beta3
metadata:
  name: pVolumeName
spec:
  capacity:
    storage: 100Gi
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteMany
  gcePersistentDisk:
    pdName: "pv-disk"
    fsType: "ext4"
```
